title: Patcher stuck on Ubunutu
body: Alright so I'm currently TRYING to install league on Ubunutu 17.10 through wine staging. Everything starts fine, no errors, it starts patching...Patcher gets to 32% then grinds to an extremely slow speed. takes 20 minutes to get to 33% 20 more to 34% and yet more 20 minutes to get to 35% then it just halts there. I've left it on overnight as well, and I highly doubt write speed is an issue at all, considering this system has a solid state drive.

replies.body: We don't officially support Ubuntu, nor do I personally know very much about that open source OS. It'd be most beneficial to look for Ubuntu help, I was actually able to find [**this article**](https://askubuntu.com/questions/459888/how-to-install-league-of-legends-in-ubuntu) that looks rather useful!
